adept.common

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • adept.common.Item
      • adept.common.HltContent
        • adept.common.Entity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasFreeTextAttributes, HasOntologizedAttributes, IEntity

    public class Entity
extends HltContent
implements IEntity, HasOntologizedAttributes, HasFreeTextAttributes
    The Class Entity, which is a thing in concrete or abstract reality that can be identified by its distinct properties, for example persons, organizations, locations, expressions of times, quantities and monetary values. The entity type is drawn from an ontology. Modified to allow additional type information (a string from an open-ended set of types) and categories (similarly open-ended).
